title: The Wild Mustang
description: Dale is a biker traveling from California to Arizona with a deep, dark secret. When he meets firecracker Sally in a local bar, will she discover his secrets or will Dale be lost forever as his demons rip apart his soul?The Wild Mustang is the first installment of the Dale Jackson Series.This book contains graphic language, consensual sex between two people, oral, and anal sex. Please read at your own discretion.
author: J.D. Anders
